explanation: WindEurope's website ([https://windeurope.org/](https://windeurope.org/)) describes the organisation as promoting wind energy in Europe. It acts as a forum for renewable energy sourcing and aims to remove barriers to renewable energy procurement. It is a trade group.

BP is one of the world's leading international oil and gas companies. It is involved in oil and gas exploration, production, refining, and distribution. Although BP has invested in renewable energy sources, it remains primarily a fossil fuel company. Therefore, I classify BP as a fossil fuel company.
